column5: Something I've been working on (sorry for bad pic).
Man you have found your calling!!!!Nice work!,now to get your business booming.
I'll try one out! Good job young man we need innovation in patterns.
Chris, add a 3rd hook to Kelly Gallops 'Sex Dungeon' and you'll be in business
Chris, add a 3rd hook to Kelly Gallops 'Sex Dungeon' and you'll be in business  For the non fisherperson this post could have some grim overtones.
For the non fisherperson this post could have some grim overtones. yes it could  BTW Bill, that's 4 hooks on that fly, not 3
Looks great Chris. I have those m*llard drake feathers you were asking for BTW.
Looks great Chris. I have those m*llard drake feathers you were asking for BTW. Awesome! I'll let you know when I can pick them up
Oohhh a ten weight oughta cast that nicely..  I wouldn't add more metal though..  I doesn't have to look like a 16th century torture device!!  Me rikey though!
I'll try one out! $20 and knock yourself out!
nicely done! I think that fly has bruiser pike written all over it  how long does it take you to spin that bad boy up?
about a half hour + the time it takes to glue the thunder creek head
I would think the big hunk of wood would get in the way of any action with it.
Very nice Chris. What do you feed it?
